Question 57 
Microprocessor
 
 
In a given 8-bit general purpose micro-controller there are following flags.  
 
C-Carry, A-Auxiliary Carry, O-Overflow flag, P-Parity (0 for even, 1 for odd)  
 
R0 and R1 are the two general purpose registers of the micro-controller.  
 
After execution of the following instructions, the decimal equivalent of the binary sequence of the flag 
pattern [CAOP] will be ______.

GATE 2023 
 [Forenoon Session]
Electrical Engineering
PAGE
51

MOV R0, +0x60 
 
MOV R1, +0x46 
 
ADD   R0, R1 
 2 (2 to 2) 
Sol. 
R0
60H

R1
46H


ADDR0,R1
0110
0000
0100
0110


1010
0110

 Carry flag = 0
Over flow flag = 1
Auxiliary carry flag = 0
Parity flag = 0
CAOP = (0010)
2
 = (2)
10
Hence, the correct answer is 2.

Question 56
